using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using AsyncGenerator.Tests.AsyncMethodFinder;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.LocalFunctions.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	public partial class ExtensionMethod
	{
		public async Task TestAsync()
		{
			Task<TType> GetFirstOrDefaultAsync<TType>(TType item) where TType : class
			{
				try
				{
					return (from e in new EnumerableQuery<TType>(new List<TType>())
							where e.Equals(item)
							select e
						).FirstOrDefaultAsync();

				}
				catch (System.Exception ex)
				{
					return Task.FromException<TType>(ex);
				}
			}
			var result = await (GetFirstOrDefaultAsync("test"));
		}
	}
}
